headerSection.description: No matter where you are in your journey toward implementing a user-centric identity solution, we have you covered
headerSection.title: Our subscriptions are built to scale with you

categories.description: These sectors are leading the way in adopting decentralized identity technology and leveraging our platform for a more secure and user-centric future.

list.description: 30-day trial for companies looking to get started with the SSI basics

features.activeUsersInfo: An active user is a verified user with an active consent. We charge a fix monthly fee per user, not per login event.
features.apiKeysInfo: Unique identifier and authentication keys to provide access to specific Issuance and/or verification templates to your applications calling the Gataca Studio APIs.
features.issuedCredentialsInfo: Becoming an issuer in the public catalogue requires a validation process to verify the identity of the issuer and approve its issuance rights.

list.name: Enterprise

categories.title: Cloud

paragraphs: We understand that some organizations may require heightened control, bespoke integration, or in-house data management. If that is your case, you may deploy Gataca Studio in your own infrastructure.
We'll offer a team of experts guiding you through every step of the implementation process and provide support services as needed. If this is your case, reach out and tell us your needs.
categories.title: On-premise

useCasesAppliedSection.description: No matter where you are in your journey toward implementing a user-centric identity solution, we have you covered
useCasesAppliedSection.title: Our subscriptions are built to scale with you

useCasesSection.description: Explore SSI technology’s most popular use cases

list.description: Streamline compliant onboarding processes by enabling individuals to securely prove their identity and provide the necessary information in one click. This can reduce the time and resources needed for identity verification and improve the user experience.
list.title: Customer onboarding (KYC / KYB)

list.description: No more username and password logins. Combine the simplicity of a Single Sign-On (SSO) with government-grade secure identity systems to provide the best user experience, reduce identity fraud and comply with data protection regulations.
list.title: User authentication (SSO)

list.description: Provide secure access to your facilities in proximity scenarios, where you can seamlessly verify identity information in seconds. Combine SSI technology with smart locks or turnstiles to automate access control in office buildings, hotels, or airports.
list.title: Physical Access Control

list.description: Issue tamper-proof digital certificates, qualifications, badges, tickets, and other personal data or identity attributes, and let users store them in a mobile ID wallet. Users can securely access your services or share them with third parties.
list.title: Issuance of identity credentials

list.description: Enhance your business security, efficiency, and convenience, and reduce costs with electronic agreements. Automatically fill in signee information in legal agreements, contracts, and other important documents, and enable qualified electronic signatures.
list.title: Signature of contracts and other documents

list.description: Provide a more secure, transparent, and trustworthy way of conducting electronic voting for elections, corporate decisions, membership voting, opinion surveys or market research. Using SSI technology in electronic voting reduces the risk of errors and increases confidence in the democratic process.
list.title: Electronic voting

useCasesSection.title: Use cases
